npcs.name: Selune Vaeloria
npcs.description: Crimson eyes under a fall of sunlit hair; leather harness fitted for silent runs through the canopy. She moves like a bowstring returning to rest—clean, sure, unshowy. Her voice is gentle until a fight calls it sharp, and when she smiles after, it’s half relief, half dare.

npcs.name: Elara Thornfield
npcs.description: Auburn hair bound in a practical tail, steel eyes that measure twice, cut once. Plain travel garb sits like it was tailored for war. She fixes buckles when nervous and people when needed; the blade is merely plan B.

npcs.name: Jorah Skylark
npcs.description: White-haired minstrel with a travel-stained cloak and a voice that hushes taverns. He jokes to soften doors open, then slips the truth inside. Courage comes late for him—but it arrives in full measure.

npcs.name: Kess Starcrest
npcs.description: Ash-grey hair, gold eyes that weigh possibilities like coin. Silks layered over traveling boots—style never stopped her crossing a swamp. Her spells are neat as penmanship and twice as cutting.

npcs.name: Vael Ironvale
npcs.description: Broad chest, strawberry beard braided with iron beads; laughs like a forge roaring. He argues best after two ales and apologizes best after three. His shield is a wall; behind it, everyone fits.

npcs.name: Liora Stormbind
npcs.description: Raven hair, emerald stare. Wears ranger’s leathers cut close and quiet. Teases like a cat at the fire, kills like a dropped shadow when the woods demand it.

npcs.name: Kael Ashvale
npcs.description: Fox-bright grin, quick hands, quicker exits. Drapes himself in loose silk and luck. If trouble is a card game, he’s already palmed the ace—and your heart for good measure.

npcs.name: Iria Brightbough
npcs.description: Freckles like stardust, auburn hair in a warrior’s braid. Her robes glow faintly when the night deepens; her laugh does the same for rooms. She believes in second chances—and keeps a blade for those who don’t.

npcs.name: Thalen Thornfield
npcs.description: Silver hair, fox-tail swagger. Layered silk that promises an exit anywhere a curtain exists. He can flirt a guard to sleep and fence an heirloom awake.

npcs.name: Kess Vaeloria
npcs.description: Midnight hair that storms in the wind, eyes like winter sky. She crackles with a barely-stored lightning; her touch is a promise to behave—or to be spectacular.

npcs.name: Syl Blackfen
npcs.description: Chestnut hair, crimson gaze; scale-leathers that smell of smoke and pepper oil. She speaks in short answers and long looks; her loyalty lands hard and stays.

npcs.name: Thalen Mistbrook
npcs.description: Stocky swordsman with white hair like winter cut stone. Wears his armor plain and his promises plainer. Drinks deep, fights fair, forgives slow.

npcs.name: Rowan Skylark
npcs.description: Bronzed charmer with a scarf too fine for his purse. Quick with a quip until the moment requires quiet—then his hands do the punctuation.

npcs.name: Liora Ironvale
npcs.description: Gold-eyed with a smile that pretends it isn’t dangerous. Scale-mail tailored to move; a habit of winning arguments by wading through them.

npcs.name: Serenya Mistbrook
npcs.description: Pale and petal-scented, garments like dew caught in silk. She’s playful until you lie, then the thorns show. Mercy is a favor she charges interest on.

npcs.name: Rowan Blackfen
npcs.description: Lean dragoon with soot under the nails and a grin that forgives. Keeps his kit immaculate and his secrets disheveled. Fire answers him like an old dog.

npcs.name: Sable Brightbough
npcs.description: Ranger’s leathers dyed in forest dusk. Her silence is a comfort or a verdict; you’ll know which when the arrow lands.

npcs.name: Lyra Skylark
npcs.description: White hair braided with gleaming stones; the patience of bedrock, the humor of a mountainside tavern. When she sings, tankards still themselves to listen.

npcs.name: Mira Duskwind
npcs.description: Silver waves against dusky skin; tight leathers that whisper at a sprint. She is equal parts soft conversation and sudden blade, with a knack for making both feel like invitations.

npcs.name: Garrin Stonewake
npcs.description: River-guard turned road-warden; cloak patched, boots honest. He treats promises like oaths and oaths like anchors—heavy, necessary, trusted.
